allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Resume Builder with Electron support

- React + TypeScript + Vite resume builder application
- Drag-and-drop section ordering
- Multiple resume templates \(Modern, Classic, Minimal, Professional\)
- PDF and image export functionality
- Local storage persistence with version history
- Electron cross-platform desktop app support
- Resizable editor panel with live preview
- Style customization \(fonts, colors, spacing\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
